authentic_reviews.text: I bought this phone after researching for weeks. The camera quality is decent for the price range, though low-light performance could be better. Battery lasts about a day with moderate usage. The build quality feels solid, but I wish it had wireless charging. Overall satisfied with the purchase.

Good coffee maker but took some time to figure out the settings. Makes decent coffee once you get the hang of it. The carafe could be better designed - it drips a bit when pouring. Customer service was helpful when I had questions.

fake_reviews.text: AMAZING AMAZING AMAZING!!! This is the BEST product EVER!!! Five stars! Highly recommend! Must buy! Perfect quality! Fast shipping! Love it so much!!!
Great product! Excellent quality! Fast delivery! Five stars! Perfect! Amazing! Outstanding! Incredible! Must buy! Highly recommend! Best purchase ever!

suspicious_reviews.text: This product is absolutely terrible! Worst purchase of my life! Complete waste of money! Don't buy this garbage!
The product arrived quickly and works as expected. No complaints here.
